parameters.name: AvgTotalUserCost
parameters.description: The query condition based on the average cost savings.

parameters.name: AvgUserImpact
parameters.description: The query condition based on the performance improvement.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end time of the last seek.

parameters.name: IndexCount
parameters.description: The query condition based on the number of indexes.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The database instance ID.

>  Only ApsaraDB RDS for SQL Server instances are supported.

parameters.name: PageNo
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: ReservedPages
parameters.description: The query condition based on the total number of pages.

parameters.name: ReservedSize
parameters.description: The query condition based on the table size.

parameters.name: RowCount
parameters.description: The query condition based on the number of table rows.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start time of the last seek.

parameters.name: UniqueCompiles
parameters.description: The query condition based on the number of compilations.

parameters.name: UserScans
parameters.description: The query condition based on the number of scans.

parameters.name: UserSeeks
parameters.description: The query condition based on the number of seeks.
